Sentencas: Pressurized operation is advantageous for many electrolysis and electrosynthesis technologies.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The effects of pressure have been studied extensively in conventional oxygen-ion conducting solid-oxide electrochemical cells.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: In constrast, very few studies have examined pressurized operation in proton-conducting electroceramics.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Protonic ceramics offer high proton conductivity at intermediate temperatures (& SIM;400-600 & DEG;C) that are well-matched to many important thermochemical synthesis processes.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Pressurized operation can bring significant additional benefits and/or provide access to synthetic pathways otherwise unavailable or thermodynamically disfavorable under ambient conditions and in higher- or lower-temperature electrochemical devices.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Here we examine pressurized steam electrolysis in protonic-ceramic unit-cell stacks based on a BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta (BCZYYb4411) electrolyte, a Ni-BZCYYb4411 composite negatrode (fuel electrode) and a BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta (BCFZY) positrode (air-steam electrode).
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The cells are packaged within unit-cell stacks, including metallic interconnects, current collectors, sealing glasses and gaskets sealed by mechanical compression.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The assembly is packaged within a stainless steel vessel for performance characterization at elevated pressure.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Protonic-ceramic electrolyzer performance is analyzed at 550 & DEG;C and pressures up to 12 bar( a ).
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Increasing the operating pressure from 2.1 to 12.6 bar( a ) enables a 40% overall decrease in the over-potential required to drive electrolysis at 500 mA cm(-2), with a 33% decrease in the cell ohmic resistance and a 60% decrease in the cell polarization resistance.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Faradaic efficiency is also found to increase with operating pressure.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: These performance improvements are attributed to faster electrode kinetics, improved gas transport, and beneficial changes to the defect equilibria in the protonic-ceramic electrolyte, which more than compensate for the slight increase in Nernst potential brought by pressurized operation.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) coupled with distribution of relaxation time (DRT) analysis provides greater insight into the fundamental processes altered by pressurized operation.
Titulo: Proton-conducting ceramics for water electrolysis and hydrogen production at elevated pressure
